info.title: Operate a pressed toggle button in reading mode

setupScript.name: setFocusOnButtonAndSetStateToPressed
setupScript.description: sets focus on the button, and sets its state to 'pressed'

user: With the reading cursor on the 'Mute' button, activate the button.
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on the 'Mute' button, activate the button.
instructions.mode: Insure NVDA is in browse mode by pressing Escape. Note: This command has no effect if NVDA is already in browse mode.

assertions.expectation: Change in state, to 'not pressed', is conveyed
